articles.title: Collection of Kim Il Sung's works Vol. 25 published
Film show to commemorate Sun's Day
articles.content:
Collection of Kim Il Sung's works Vol. 25 published 
   Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Volume 25 of the complete collection of Kim Il Sung's works, the library of the Juche idea, was brought out by the Worker's Party of Korea Publishing House on the threshold of Sun's Day.   This volume contains reports, speeches, conclusions, talks  and other  immortal writings, 28 in all, published by the President Kim Il Sung between January and August Juche 49 (1960).    Contained in the works are the outstanding ideas, theories and policies he put forward to strengthen the driving forces of the revolution in every way, accelerate socialist construction and invigorate the struggle for national reunification, acquiring a deep insight into the requirements of the developing Korean revolution and the trend of the situation.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung praised by Indian
articles.content:
Film show to commemorate Sun's Day
   Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang City People's Committee on Friday sponsored a film show at the Taedonggang Club for the diplomatic corps with the approach of Sun's Day.   Chinese residents here were invited to the show.   The participants saw the documentary film "the Great Life in 1994" showing the tireless revolutionary activities of the President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Palestinian ambassador gives reception
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung praised by Indian
   Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- N. K. Shukra, joint secretary of the All-India Peasants'  Federation, made public a statement last Saturday on the threshold of the birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung.   He said in the statement that President Kim Il Sung, born into a patriotic and revolutionary family, devoted his all only to the fatherland and the people for many years.   The President clearly indicated the way for the era and revolution  to follow by founding the Juche idea for the first time in history, the statement noted.   It stressed that his revolutionary feats in founding the idea and carrying it into practice are a common wealth, which will shine forever along with the cause of human liberation.

articles.title: Commemorative events on Sun's Day
Joint performance in 17th art festival
"Army airforce operational command"
articles.content:
Joint performance in 17th art festival
    Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A German musical ensemble, which had come here to participate in the 17th April Spring Friendship Art Festival, and the Yun I Sang Orchestra gave a joint performance at the Yun I Sang concert hall before the opening of the festival.   Seeing the performance were vice-chairman Kim Yong Sin of the festival organizing committee, Ri Su Ja, widow of Yun I Sang, officials concerned and Pyongyangites.   The performers represented well the thematic contents of the music pieces with peculiar and characteristic tone color and a harmony in ensemble.   An orchestra "Song of Loyalty," a soprano solo "We sing of happiness of having leader," and so on. Performed by artistes of the Yun I Sang orchestra were also acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Mongolian art troupe performs in Pyongyang
articles.content:
"Army airforce operational command"
   Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The South Korean rulers announced that they would found "army airforce operational command" on April 20, a Seoul-based radio report said.   The "command" is reportedly to be found by "joining the army airforce power in such a way as to ensure offensives characterized by strategic and operational battles."   Their announcement illustrates that their moves for war against the north are being pushed to a more practical phase.

articles.title: Foreign guests visit several places
articles.content:
Mongolian art troupe performs in Pyongyang
    Pyongyang, April 1o (KCNA) -- The Mongolian art troupe staying here to participate in the 17th April Spring Friendship Art Festival  gave a performance here on Friday before its opening.   It was appreciated by vice-chairpersons of the organizing committee of the festival Kung Sok Ung and  Kim Yong Sin  as well as working people and  artistes in the city.   Mongolian ambassador to Korea D. Byambaa and embassy officials saw the performance.   Mongolian artistes put  on the stage a colorful program prepared by them with sincerity.  It included Korean songs "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", "Thunder on Jong Il Peak" and so on.

articles.title: 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election to NDC chairmanship
First Kimilsungia Show
articles.content:
6th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election to NDC chairmanship
    Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Public security men and servicemen of the People's Security Force met on April 9 to pledge loyalty to General Secretary Kim Jong Il and had a gala evening to mark the 6th anniversary of his election to the chairmanship of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.   The participants in the meeting vowed to firmly defend the political system with the burning hatred for the class enemy.   At the end of the meeting there was an art performance. Then followed a gala evening.   More than 10,000 youths and students in Pyongyang gave a national defense mass gymnastic display "we will devotedly defend Pyongyang, the heart of the revolution" at the Kim Il Sung Square.   Gala evenings of youths and students took place in different parts of the country.
